metadata.title: Tihar Jail Horror Story
metadata.description: Tihar Jail — a name that strikes fear across India. Known for housing the most dangerous criminals, it's also home to dark secrets that go far beyond the physical. In this horror story, we explore the eerie atmosphere of one of Asia’s most feared prisons, where whispers of paranormal activity, cursed cells, and unexplained events have existed for decades. What happens when fear takes over, not from inmates, but from something... unseen? Experience a spine-chilling tale set in the shadows of Tiha
